name: Ocean's Treasures
description: Ocean's Treasures is a VR underwater treasure hunt that places the player on the bottom of the sea to explore shipwrecks and recover lost treasures. Within 12 different scenes, you will be surrounded by some spectacular environment and fishes.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1070 equivalent or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1080 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 6 GB available space
